scripts.clean: npm run tempclean ; npm run distclean
scripts.webclean: rm ../larn-deploy/*.xml ; rm ../larn-deploy/*.png ; rm ../larn-deploy/*.html ; rm ../larn-deploy/*.css ; rm ../larn-deploy/*.txt ; rm ../larn-deploy/*.md || true
scripts.deployclean: npm run clean ; npm run alphaclean ; npm run betaclean ; npm run prodclean ; npm run webclean ; npm run histclean ; npm run imgclean
scripts.minify: uglifyjs --mangle --compress -o larn-temp/larn.min.js larn-temp/common/util.js larn-temp/common/larn_config.js larn-temp/common/frame.js larn-temp/common/patch.js larn-temp/common/roll.js larn-temp/common/lambda.js larn-temp/common/cloudflare.js larn-temp/common/movie.js larn-temp/common/live.js larn-temp/config.js larn-temp/larn.js larn-temp/main.js larn-temp/object.js larn-temp/global.js larn-temp/monster.js larn-temp/monsterdata.js larn-temp/player.js larn-temp/mazes.js larn-temp/level.js larn-temp/create.js larn-temp/data.js larn-temp/parse.js larn-temp/buttons.js larn-temp/scores.js larn-temp/inventory.js larn-temp/movem.js larn-temp/action.js larn-temp/io.js larn-temp/display.js larn-temp/storedata.js larn-temp/store.js larn-temp/mcdopes.js larn-temp/savelev.js larn-temp/spells.js larn-temp/spellsinfo.js larn-temp/regen.js larn-temp/spheres.js larn-temp/help.js larn-temp/state.js larn-temp/bill.js larn-temp/altar.js larn-temp/fountain.js larn-temp/potion.js larn-temp/scroll.js larn-temp/stairs.js larn-temp/throne.js larn-temp/devmode.js larn-temp/fullstory.js
scripts._copy: echo $envt ; mkdir -p dist/$envt/lib ; mkdir dist/$envt/img ; mkdir dist/$envt/workers ; cp src/lib/*.js dist/$envt/lib ; cp src/img/* dist/$envt/img ; cp src/larn.html dist/$envt ; cp src/larn.css dist/$envt ; cp larn-temp/larn.min.js dist/$envt ; cp larn-temp/workers/patchWorker.js dist/$envt/workers ; cp larn-temp/workers/compressionWorker.js dist/$envt/workers || true
scripts._tvcopy: mkdir -p dist/$envt/tv/common ; cp larn-temp/tv/* dist/$envt/tv ; cp larn-temp/common/* dist/$envt/tv/common ; cp src/tv/index.html dist/$envt/tv ; cp src/tv/larntv.css dist/$envt/tv || true
scripts.distweb: npm run webclean ; npm run webcopy || true
scripts.dist: npm run distalpha ; npm run distbeta ; npm run distprod ; npm run distweb || true
scripts.buildalpha: npm run alphaclean ; npm run transpile ; npm run minify ; npm run alphacopy ; npm run alphatv ; npm run distalpha
scripts.buildbeta: npm run betaclean ; npm run transpile ; npm run minify ; npm run betacopy ; npm run betatv ; npm run distbeta
scripts.buildprod: npm run prodclean ; npm run transpile ; npm run minify ; npm run prodcopy ; npm run prodtv ; npm run distprod
scripts.build: echo '=== STARTING BUILD ==' ; npm run distclean ; npm run transpile ; npm run minify ; npm run prodcopy ; npm run tempclean
scripts.buildall: echo '=== STARTING FULL BUILD ==' ; npm run deployclean ; npm run transpile ; npm run minify ; npm run alphacopy ; npm run betacopy ; npm run prodcopy ; npm run webcopy ; npm run alphatv ;  npm run betatv ; npm run prodtv ; npm run dist ; npm run clean
scripts.watch: npm run tempclean ; babel src --watch --out-dir larn-temp/
scripts.deploy_tv_lambda_test: cd src/tv/aws ; zip function.zip *.js *.mjs ;  aws lambda update-function-code --function-name movie_test --zip-file fileb://function.zip ; rm function.zip
scripts.deploy_tv_lambda: cd src/tv/aws ; zip function.zip *.js *.mjs ;  aws lambda update-function-code --function-name movies --zip-file fileb://function.zip ; rm function.zip
scripts.deploy_tv_prunetvscores: cd .. ; zip -j function.zip larn-tools/prunetv/* ;  aws lambda update-function-code --function-name prunetvscores --zip-file fileb://function.zip ; rm function.zip
scripts.deploy_larn_lambda_test: cd src/aws ; zip function.zip *.js *.mjs ;  aws lambda update-function-code --function-name test --zip-file fileb://function.zip ; rm function.zip
scripts.deploy_larn_lambda_score: cd src/aws ; zip function.zip *.js *.mjs ;  aws lambda update-function-code --function-name score --zip-file fileb://function.zip ; rm function.zip
scripts.deploy_cloudflare: cd ../larn-local/cloudflare/broadcast ; npx wrangler deploy ; npx wrangler tail
